generated_caption: The number of capital inflows from China into Russia in 2020 was estimated to be 12.4 billion U.S. dollars . In 2020 , the age-adjusted death rates from coronavirus in the U.S. increased by 147 percent from January to March compared to the same quarter in 2019 . The age-adjusted death rate is an epidemiological statistic which measures mortality rates by age .
